verses.name: Genesis 41:31
verses.text: And the plenty shall not be known in the land by reason of that famine following; for it shall be very grievous.

verses.name: Genesis 41:32
verses.text: And for that the dream was doubled unto Pharaoh twice; it is because the thing is established by God, and God will shortly bring it to pass.

verses.name: Genesis 41:33
verses.text: Now therefore let Pharaoh look out a man discreet and wise, and set him over the land of Egypt.

verses.name: Genesis 41:34
verses.text: Let Pharaoh do this, and let him appoint officers over the land, and take up the fifth part of the land of Egypt in the seven plenteous years.
